original_title: Shockheaded Peter and Other Songs from The Tiger Lillies
overview: Impossible to categorise, The Tiger Lillies have been singing their own brand of blasphemous ballads, tragic tales and debauched ditties since 1991. This concert from the PS122 theatre in New York features a selection of songs, including some from their sensational smash-hit theatre production Shockheaded Peter.
tagline: Live in Concert in New York
title: Shockheaded Peter and Other Songs from The Tiger Lillies
